title: retire blocks last error: DumpBlocks: DumpTxs: BigChunks: body not found
body:
I was on branch `mdbx_aug_dbg` , testing for issue #4039 when this error occurred and eventually halted the node:
``` 
err="[5/16 Senders] retireBlocksInSingleBackgroundThread: [5/16 Senders Prune] retire blocks last error: DumpBlocks: DumpTxs: BigChunks: body not found: 14795000, d46ab0b87dc1f91040e3419a8349a1172425f74c01b92646d80d81f7af22018a, fromBlock=14795000, toBlock=14796000"
``` 

It ends up on just writing block headers, with `respMax` beeing the tip of the chain.

Edit: I commented the above while having no access on the pc and I miss-remembered so here is what I actually really did:

My exact issue was https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/4323#issuecomment-1145031047 and solved it by:

```
rm <your_datadir>/snapshots/v1-0146*
rm <your_datadir>/snapshots/v1-0147*
./build/bin/integration stage_headers --reset --datadir=<your_datadir>
./build/bin/downloader torrent_hashes --verify --datadir=<your_datadir>
```
